data.title: The Dominican Development Group
data.meta_site_name: Dominican Republic Missions - Christian Missionaries - The Dominican Development Group
data.text:
The Dominican Development Group is collaborating with the Communications Committee of the Diocese of the Dominican Republic to post an interactive map of the Episcopal churches, schools, and other institutions in the Dominican Republic. The locations contain exact GPS coordinates, and most have photographs of the buildings. This map is being shared on this DDG website as well as on the website of the Diocese of the Dominican Republic – “Ubicaciones” section.

For another version of this GPS map data in a brochure format, click here for English | click here for Spanish.

The map will open with the locations of the Episcopal churches. To see the names and locations of the churches, toggle the “index menu box” to the left of the words “Iglesia Episcopal Dominicana” on the upper left of the map. Then click on the name of any church that you would like to see and it will be highlighted on the interactive map. Below the names of the churches are other group listings for the schools and the other facilities. You can click to open those group listings and then click for the location and photos (if available) for the church or other facility you have chosen.

– – – – –

September 27, 2016: Map app links below. For instructions in using this feature, go here.
